direction.raw_text: No! Stay away, Snake. He's mucho muerte. Suddenly a shot rings out. Taslima is struck and falls. Plissken drops between the cars and crawls over to her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Run, Snake...They're coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who? She touches his hand and looks at him softly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. Taslima dies. Plissken stares at her for a moment. More shots ring out - landing very close to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From out of the heavy bushes along the freeway storm a dozen Mescalitos moving quickly - firing as they go. Behind them grinds an ancient garbage truck mounted with a 50-caliber machine gun. Atop the truck is Delgado. He wears a flame thrower on his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Returns fire, rolls under a car and begins crawling. All around him people jump out of their cars, begin firing back at the Mescalitos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Smashes through a rusting Volkswagen, heading straight toward him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Reaches the edge of the freeway, dives for the bushes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Roars past, firing into the vehicles on the freeway, the people running, screaming...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clawing his way through the undergrowth, Plissken bursts onto a side street. Behind him come the Mescalitos on foot. Plissken runs, firing back every step of the way...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suddenly, in the blowing mist in front of him, a car screeches into view. It's a perfectly restored, 1966 Cadillac convertible. Candy-apple red. The stereo blasts "Last Night" by the Satellites. And behind the wheel is Map To The Stars Eddie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hop in, Snake!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the garbage truck bursts through. Delgado is behind the machine gun, blasting away, burning up the street. Bullets are flying everywhere as Plissken runs to the Cadillac and dives into the back seat. He's still not fully inside when Map To The Stars Eddie roars away in a blaze of rubber and smoke.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Takes aim with his flame thrower... KAWHOOSH!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoots out from the nozzle like a flaming spear. It streaks down the street, just missing the tail of the Cadillac as it swerves around a corner...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Map To The Stars Eddie races along a dark street. Plissken climbs into the front seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Snake - that was great. They almost burned your ass off! Map To The Stars Eddie drives like Satan himself. Plissken is almost thrown out as they spin around curves, up onto sidewalks. Delgado and the garbage truck can't keep up with them. Finally, the Mescalitos are left far behind as Map To The Stars Eddie slows down to a cruise of 70.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Too many people know where you're going, Snake. That's not good. Delgado and his men were back there waiting for you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Delgado?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones' right-hand man. One tough hombre. You don't understand, Snake. Cuervo Jones wants to unify the island. We're on the move, man. Big time.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Cadillac smashes through an intersection, knocking two old junked cars out of the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken jams his 9mm into Map To The Stars Eddie's ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop the damn car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said pull over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right. Anything for you, Snake. (beat) Although I was going to take you to Cuervo Jones' place. Plissken lowers the gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right over there. He points. Plissken looks off, as Map To The Stars Eddie hits a button on the steering wheel with his finger.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A small panel in front of Plissken flips down, revealing a two- inch machine gun barrel. Before he can do anything, four rounds rip straight into his chest, blasting him into the seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Grits his teeth and gasps. His gun drops. Blood runs from four holes in his shirt. His face grows red as he fights for air. Map To The Stars Eddie pushes the button again and the panel closes up over the barrel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pretty neat, huh? This is Cuervo's car. He lets me use it sometimes. (looks at Plissken) Not to worry, Snake. You were just shot with a fun-gun. You feel it? Plissken gulps for air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pure mesh, man. 100-proof artery choker. Plissken slumps back, collapses in the seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like Cuervo says, when the hit pulls you down to one inch from death, that is living, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kicks in hard. Surreal colors float through the dark, devastated streets of Venice. Plissken fights desperately against the drug, but he can't move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You should've talked to me first, Snake. I could've set this whole thing up. I'm actually Cuervo's agent, you know. As Plissken sags, losing consciousness, Map To The Stars Eddie's voice begins to fade...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I'd love to represent you, too. We could make a bundle together. I know I could really help your career...I mean, you're a legend and all - but the last couple years, man, it's like you've fallen off the face of the earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the world crashes to black!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a giant, scorched daddy-long-legs, the architectural identity of the LA airport rises above the empty parking lot littered with the skeletal remains of burned-out cars and airport shuttles. The wrecks of old 747s lie twisted and bent across the tarmac.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surrounded by Mescalitos with torches and guns, sits the former Bradley Terminal defaced with graffiti, the sign now reading:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Opens. Looks around fuzzily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is in Cuervo Jones lair. Huge. Torch-lit. Plissken lies in the center of the room, chained to a treadmill. He is surrounded by Mescalitos. In one corner of the room is lots of high-tech equipment. Computers. A VR simulator. Most of the Mescalitos are gathered around a big screen TV. They watch the 207th Annual Academy Awards from Carefree, Arizona. Cuervo Jones strides toward Plissken. Map To The Stars Eddie scurries along at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, Cuervo. I delivered him, didn't I? All I'm asking for is what you promised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'll see. Cuervo Jones stops in front of Plissken. Sees that he's awake. Holds out a glass filled with red liquid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Carrot juice? (no response) Laced with tequila, Snake. Good for you. No? (no response) Your health. Cuervo Jones downs the carrot juice. Plissken lifts his head, grimaces. Sweat pours down his face. He gasps for air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're coming out of it, Snake. It hurts real bad. (beat) That's good. He kneels down next to Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dying isn't good enough for you. You need pain. You'll never make it to where you want to go without a little pain. He stands, considers Plissken for a moment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake Plissken. American outlaw. So typical of American idealism. The old west, Snake. Cuervo Jones tosses the glass to Map To The Stars Eddie. He's beginning to enjoy the moment, performing for Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Man against the sky. The individual. Freedom. No wonder they hate you so much in America, Snake. You remind them of what they used to be. Cuervo Jones walks to a door, opens it. Beyond is a huge courtyard filled with people - families, teenage runaways, the elderly, illegal aliens, orphans - people with nowhere to go. They are being fed and cared for by Mescalitos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here is the real L.A., Snake. Plissken lifts his head to see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The poor. The old. The lost. People without hope. He crosses back to Plissken...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you know what they want? One word. Liberation. (beat) They want a chance to live - before it's all gone. They've been hated for too long - (smiles) Now it's their turn. He gestures to his men, who move to Plissken and begin carefully unlocking him from the treadmill. Still wobbly, Plissken crawls to his feet... As Utopia comes bounding up from the big screen TV. Still dressed in her racy underwear, she gives Cuervo Jones a kiss. She still carries the prototype with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo! LaToya Jackson just won Best Actress. Cuervo Jones reaches out to take the prototype from her. She holds on to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said I could hold it. He yanks it out of her hands, more violently than she expected. Recovering, she casts a contemptuous glance at Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You never heard of Snake Plissken? Utopia takes a couple steps closer, squints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't look like his picture. (frown) I bet he's fake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now go get dressed. We have things to do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are we going to eat soon? I'm starved. Cuervo Jones gives her a slap on the butt, which startles Utopia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ooww!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go on now. Do as I say. Plissken watches as Utopia walks away, out of the terminal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm going to show her what it means to be a woman - for the first time in her pathetic little life. (smiles) Given her love, Snake. Everybody needs love. He moves slightly closer to Plissken - though not too close.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to hook up with us? Join the revolution? We're all getting out of here tomorrow night. (holds up the prototype) We're gonna rule the world. Come with us, Snake. Plissken says nothing. His good eye glares.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No? Too bad. Well, I told you we'd finish it later. So guess what? It's later. He motions to his men, who grab Plissken and drag him away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The baggage claim area is an industrial wasteland filled with machinery and hanging cables and wires. A door opens and Plissken is hurled in. The door slams shut. Plissken stands a moment, trying to get his balance, when a man steps out of the shadows. It is Delgado.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're mine now, Snake. All mine. Delgado slowly moves towards Plissken, swinging two huge gleaming machetes around his head. Plissken steps back, glances at his wrist watch. 4 hours and 20 minutes gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit. Plissken looks up as Delgado flings a machete at him. He just barely dives out of the way, rolls on the floor... Delgado charges toward him, machete poised like a bayonet. Plissken rips off an edge guard from the baggage carousel and wings it at Delgado. The machete is blocked with a direct hit. KA- CLANG! Delgado is thrown sideways. Plissken runs, launches himself through the air, twisting his body sideways, and lands a hard kick right in Delgado's face. Delgado goes sprawling. One of the machetes CLANKS to the floor... Plissken grabs the machete, just as Delgado rises...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Plissken's arm is a blur as he throws...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The machete sticks out of Delgado's chest. He looks down at it in horror, then crumbles to the floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The caravan is starting up again. Wearing hot pants, a tank top and full-length mink coat, Utopia is escorted up a ladder by Cuervo Jones to the opened door of the Cadillac perched up on those monster truck wheels. The other Mescalitos mount up in their cars and motorcycles, and roar away from the terminal. Above, on top of the terminal, see a figure move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Plissken. He grabs an electrical wire and throws it over the side...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - A MESCALITO GUARD Stands watching the caravan pull away. He doesn't see the wire dangling behind him, and Plissken shinnying down it. Beat. Beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Plissken takes him out with one blow, lowers himself to the ground, takes his rifle. Plissken quickly moves down the dark street after the caravan.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones' caravan comes rolling down Manchester, into a vast parking lot toward the Forum. Portions of the gigantic sports arena have been damaged in the earthquake, but crowds still pour into the entrances. The caravan pulls up at the Forum Club entrance. Cuervo Jones, Utopia, Map To The Stars Eddie and the others enter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Approaches, ducks behind an old junked car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - DAMAGED WALL Plissken sneaks up to a crumbled, broken wall of the Forum, crawls inside through a large crack...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken's in the backstage area, near the locker rooms. Hear cheering from the main arena. Slowly Plissken moves to a door, opens it, steps out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cheering is louder is Plissken makes his way along the dingy hallway. Now the sound of gunfire from someplace up ahead. Plissken tenses. Suddenly from down the hallway come two Black Muslims carrying a body on a stretcher. As they pass, Plissken notices the body is wearing a bloody basketball uniform full of bullet holes. He moves forward...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken peers into the main arena. A basketball game is underway. The Korean Dragons sit on one side, the Black Muslims on the other. They cheer wildly for their respective teams. Pipeline is in the crowd, enjoying the game... Plissken moves closer, among the crowd along the baseline. The whole place is lit by torches and clumsily-wired lighting. Above his head is the shot clock, slowly ticking down. There's blood everywhere on the floor. The referees wear bullet- proof body suits and helmets. Trainers with stretchers stand by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CLOCK Ticks down: 5 - 4...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dribbles the ball towards the basket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CLOCK Ticks down: 3 - 2... A whole row of Korean Dragons with rifles stand and take aim.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pulls up into a jump shot, releases the ball into the air. It sails through the basket just as the horn goes off, beating the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: second violation. The Black Muslim crowd cheers. The Korean Dragons sit down. Plissken watches...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving through the seats on the Korean Dragon side of the court. Map To The Stars Eddie stands near the baseline, listening to the game on his silver portable radio...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: CUERVO JONES, UTOPIA AND THE OTHERS

direction.raw_text: Hands the ball to a Korean Dragon guard. The Korean Dragon dribbles the ball down court, into the corner and passes it off. The Korean Dragons can't get a shot off...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CLOCK Above Plissken's head ticks down: 5 - 4 - 3 - 2 - 1... HONK!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guard still has the ball - the shot clock horn has gone off - 24 second violation. A whole row of Black Muslims with rifles stand up, take aim, and fire!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLAM! BLAM! The Korean Dragon guard is riddled with bullets. He falls dead on the floor. The Trainers with stretchers quickly collect his body and hurry off the court. Ball boys quickly wipe up the blood with mops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) (sound of effect of breaking glass) Shot clock! The Black Muslim crowd is cheering and screaming! "I Love L.A." begins playing on the loudspeaker. The players wear do-rags and black uniforms that look a whole lot like the black leather that Plissken wears. One of the players,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: notices Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey - Snake Plissken, you knew my brother Abdul. He was with you in Cleveland. The other players react, greet Plissken, slapping his hand, thumping chests, high-fiving each other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Welcome aboard, Snake. But Plissken pays no attention. He sees:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sitting in the Korean Dragon section near the other end of the court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R - CUERVO JONES AND UTOPIA Sit next to Xi-Ping, the leader of the Korean Dragons, a fierce man with green and brown psychedelic camouflage on his face. Utopia watches the game while the two men confer. Cuervo Jones has a firm grip on the prototype.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The time is now. We are the strongest. If we go together, the others will come. (beat) We go for everything, Xi-Ping. But we go together. What do you say? Xi-Ping nodes. They clasp hands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Realizes he's got to get to the other side of the court. He jumps into the huddle with Jamaal, peering at him with his one good, cold eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your brother died owing me, so I'm taking it out in trade. I need a favor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, Snake. Anything.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to get across the court now... without drawing attention to myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like you ain't gonna stick out like a sore thumb. But we'll do what we can, Snake. Use the clock. Screen and roll. Now let's kick some butt! The players knock fists. Plissken puts on a do-rag. Yelling, they move onto the court, creating a shield for Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (whispers) You play much pick-up ball, Snake? Plissken's watching Cuervo Jones and Utopia at the other end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever happens, watch the shot clock, man. The referee blows his whistle. A Black Muslim guard inbounds the ball. The game is underway. Plissken ducks down the court using the rest of his team as cover. They go into a set play. The game is a cross between basketball and kung-fu. Players use slashing fists, spin-kicks, elbows and hard back-hands. It's full combat. The Korean Dragon guarding Plissken chops him. Plissken knocks him flat. No foul. Utopia sees Plissken, nudges Cuervo Jones.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's that weird guy again. Cuervo Jones grabs her and heads for the exit... Plissken sees this, stops playing, moves after them... when suddenly the basketball lands right in his hands!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake! Shot clock!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CLOCK Ticks down: 4 - 3 - 2... A whole row of Korean Dragons with rifles stand up, take aim at Plissken. Cuervo Jones watches expectantly... Plissken spins, executes a beautiful-looking jump shot. The horn sounds just as it leaves his hand...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Swish. Nothing but net. The Korean Dragons sit back down, put away their rifles, disappointed. Cuervo Jones, Utopia, Xi-Ping and their henchmen quickly leave. The Black Muslims go crazy, and Plissken dashes toward one of the exits. He stops, sees...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With his portable radio, trying to get out of the arena, hiding behind a crowd of Dragons. Plissken races through the crowd, grabs Map To The Stars Eddie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Snake, man... Great shot! Without hesitation, Snake whacks him across the jaw. Map To The Stars Eddie goes down like a sack of laundry. Plissken grabs him by the collar, drags him off toward an exit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones, Utopia, Xi-Ping and their men rush out to the caravan of waiting vehicles. Xi-Ping has his own armada of vehicles and an army of evil-looking guards. Cuervo Jones pulls Xi-Ping aside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That man in black. He's very dangerous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One eye?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. We gotta dump him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does he want?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (glances at the prototype) I'm betting the cops sent him in. Man, I do not need this. I got a war to win.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - THE FORUM As Plissken drags Map To The Stars Eddie out into the night, crouches behind a row of cars, watches Cuervo Jones' caravan start their engines. Plissken shakes Map To The Stars Eddie, waking him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are they going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (groggy) Oh, man... You didn't have to hit me, Snake. I can help you. Plissken shoves the barrel of his pistol up against Map To The Stars Eddie's temple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bankrupt City. The Happy Kingdom. (beat) Snake, Cuervo's hooked up with Xi-Ping. He is primetime, man - Mister Bad News. The rest of the city's joining up with 'em. (beat) You're shit outta luck, Snake. Plissken reaches into a pocket, comes out with the large black clip, slips it on his 9mm pistol.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could've helped you. We coulda made a deal with Cuervo. If you'd listen... Without looking, Plissken slams his elbow into Map To The Stars Eddie's jaw with a WHACK! He flops unconscious on the pavement... Cuervo Jones' caravan led by that huge Cadillac on monster wheels, moves away from the Forum toward an exit. Plissken moves after them, ducking behind the row of cars...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The caravan picks up speed as it approaches the exit... Plissken appears behind an old truck, just as the Cadillac moves past him. He crouches on the balls of his feet, and as the rear of the Caddy drifts closer, he springs... And grabs on to the rear bumper. The monster wheels spin like huge, black scythes on either side of him. Plissken reaches under the Caddy, finds a purchase on the undercarriage, and swings under the Cadillac. He hangs dangling above the street by one hand as the caravan pulls out onto Manchester. With the other he raises his 9mm and aims it at the undercarriage, right about where the front seat should be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The front seat explodes, bullets screaming upward through the leather seats, tearing and shredding fabric and flesh, killing the driver and Xi-Ping instantly! In the back seat sit Cuervo Jones and Utopia. The Caddy begins to swerve, the wheel spinning. Cuervo Jones lunges forward across the seat and grabs it. Under the Cadillac, Plissken continues to fire: BLAM, BLAM, BLAM, BLAM! The front seat disintegrates. Metal, leather, padding fly everywhere. Cuervo Jones ducks against the door, covering his face with one hand, still grasping the wheel with the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The entire front seat and floor underneath it fall down out of the Cadillac and hit the street below. The bodies of the driver and X- Ping flop under the monster wheels. Plissken swings over to the hole and pulls himself up into the opening that used to be the front seat. Cuervo Jones stares at him in total shock, but before he can speak... Plissken rips the prototype out of his hands! Then jumps into the back seat next to Utopia. Then grabs her and turns to the side door. Cuervo Jones releases the wheel for a moment, turns to grab Plissken... But Plissken opens the side door, kicks it wide, and with Utopia under his arm, slides across the seat... ... and sails out of the Cadillac...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Plissken and Utopia fly through the air, and land with a thud on top of a Mescalito car as the Cadillac begins to swerve wildly. Cuervo Jones grabs the wheel, desperately tries to control the Caddy... but fails. The Cadillac careens off the street, slams into the palm tree, spins around and crashes into the remains of a hot dog stand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken and Utopia roll and tumble. He still has a hold of her, and she fights him tooth and nail...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: ON THE ROOF OF THE MESCALITO CAR

direction.raw_text: Lemme go...!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The driver swerves, hits the brakes... and the car hops the curb, slides along the sidewalk, burning rubber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are thrown forward. They tumble off the roof... across the hood... and land on the sidewalk in front of the car. They roll to a stop, as the car screeches to a stop, inches from their heads, as the caravan suddenly puts on its brakes. Screaming tires. Cars jackknifing, spinning in a massive traffic collision... Cuervo Jones emerges from the remains of the Cadillac. Plissken drags Utopia into the street, grabs the lid of a manhole in the street, pries it up... Mescalitos pour out of their vehicles, as Cuervo Jones charges into the street, pointing at Plissken...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kill him, kill him...! Plissken lifts Utopia to her feel, hauls her over to the manhole opening, and dives inside... just as the Mescalitos open fire! The street around the manhole opening explodes with screaming hot lead...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken and Utopia land in the half-filled storm drain. He gets to his feet, pulls her with him, and heads off sloshing through the water. The sound of gunfire echoes above them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones and the Mescalitos charge the open manhole as Map To The Stars Eddie appears groggily shuffling up the street from the Forum...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grins to himself) Good thinkin', Snake. He heads off down the street...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken and Utopia race along through the water. He literally has to drag her with him. They turn a corner, go down another slimy drain away from the main tunnel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The black belly of the sewer system. Plissken and Utopia move along, slow as they come to...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One side of the passage, the same one we saw earlier on our journey with Pendejo Bob. Plissken spins Utopia around, pushes her backward toward the drop- off, his eye burning into her... Her feet reach the very edge. Plissken holds her there. Utopia's face is a mask of sheer terror. She gulps air in staccato bursts... Beat. Beat. Plissken can't do it. He can't push her off. He releases her, backs up, looks at the prototype, then pulls one of his revolvers from its holster, cocks the hammer, aims...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My... father sent you... didn't he? (beat) He sent you to kill me... Plissken raises the pistol. She's dead in his sights.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Didn't he? (begins to cry) But Plissken can't. He can't kill her. The toughest man on planet Earth can't kill this 17-year-old runaway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit. Plissken sags, clicks the hammer back, holsters the gun. He stares at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out of here. Utopia wipes her eyes, confused, afraid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I said go! Slowly Utopia moves from the edge of the drop off, starts away down the tunnel, then stops, looks back at Plissken. She stares at the prototype in Plissken's hand...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't take it back. Don't give it to him. Please. Let me have it. Plissken glances at the prototype, then at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does this thing do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (her eyes grow wide) No!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Plissken's shoulder explodes as a bullet tears through his flesh! He spins, drops the prototype... ... as Map To The Stars Eddie emerges from the darkness of the sewer tunnel. He holds a gun in one hand, aims...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! He fires again, hits Plissken's leg. Plissken staggers backward toward the edge of the drop off, as Map To The Stars Eddie moves quickly forward... ... and snatches the prototype from the wet floor. Plissken's gun hand is useless, numb from the shoulder wound. He slowly, painfully transfers the pistol to the other hand, tries to raise it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So long, Snake. Map To The Stars Eddie takes aim - a head shot ... Plissken spins, and dives off the edge... ... down into the drop off...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Airborne. Falling through black space. Down, down, down, straight to hell below, until we can't see him anymore as the darkness swallows him up... Map To The Stars Eddie steps to the ledge, looks down, as Cuervo Jones and his Mescalitos slog up through the tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is he?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He jumped. Down there. (beat) He's dead, Cuervo. I did it. I killed Plissken. Cuervo Jones looks over the edge, at the silent blackness below. Then he turns to Map To The Stars Eddie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give it to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said I could be Vice-President, Cuervo. Your right-hand man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (extends his hand) Give it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, Cuervo, but look here. I've done it all, man. I killed Plissken, I got your girl back, I got it all. Just for you, Cuervo. Just for you. Dead silence. Cuervo Jones stands with his hand extended. Finally Map To The Stars Eddie gives up, starts to hand Cuervo the prototype... ... but slips on the wet floor... ... and drops the prototype with a CLANK!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A red light comes on, blinks urgently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (tiny, filtered) I am now armed and ready for use. Use extreme caution. The location of the effected blast area can only be determined by the orbital position of the SatStar Ring. Everyone in the tunnel is frozen, unable to move. Slowly Cuervo Jones picks up the prototype, stares at it, then breaks into a smile...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is turning out to be my lucky day. (stares coldly at Map To The Stars Eddie) Get this asshole outta here. Several Mescalitos grab Map To The Stars Eddie, pull him back along the tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo, wait. Please... Cuervo Jones turns to Utopia, who stands numbly staring off at the drop-off. He walks over to her, then slaps her hard, viciously, across the face. Utopia reacts to the stinging slap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're my woman, you understand? You don't let anybody take you away from me without a fight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (in her face) Nobody leaves Cuervo Jones. Not unless you give your life. You fight till you're dead. Then I forgive you. (screams) Understand? (shakes her) Understand?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes... He shoves her down the tunnel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go. The others follow them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Cuervo Jones and Utopia emerge from the manhole cover, hear the sound of hundreds of helicopters rise.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looks up) Look, baby. They're all mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Above Manchester and the Forum is filled with helicopters. All models, all makes, mostly the older, discarded military Blood Phoenix 14-bladed attack choppers that scream through the blackness like scythe-slashing robot bugs. They are on their way southeast, toward Orange County.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. BY NIGHT Looking out at L.A. from above Mount Lee, see the Hollywood Sign, and wave after wave of helicopters thundering across the city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're like buck teeth, sheered off and crumbling, stuck up in to the sky. Chopper roar overhead. A group of vagrants cluster around a camp fire on the top floor of one of the towers. They're watching a futuristic big-spin lotto on a large screen TV. The sound of the choppers brings them to the edge of the building - the walls of the floors beneath have been torn away. Desk, furniture, rugs, everything hangs out over the empty space.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pandemonium. Troops, vehicles, helicopters, everything is in urgent motion. A loudspeaker voice blares:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Full stage battle alert. All personnel to battle stations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Malloy, the President and Brazen charge down a hallway into Command HQ. The place is jumping. Full scramble alert.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A sky full of enemy choppers on radar. Moving over the city to the southeast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Officer rushes up to Malloy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commander - massive vehicle and troop movement on the ground. All major streets leading to the southeast.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're they doing? Malloy looks at the President grimly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Getting ready to invade.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (beat) So where's Plissken?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Creaking. The WHOOSH of something swinging through the air... A huge blue eye opens. Looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken's boot is hooked in a twisted wire mesh...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then Plissken swings like a pendulum, hanging from a long strand of wire mesh attached somewhere above in the blackness. Plissken's eye blinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Begins to reveal details: slimy walls. Below, a black pit of hell. Wind gushing. And then a light stabs across the void...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... The light hits Plissken's good eye... The light is from inside the eye of Pendejo Bob. He stands on a small ledge, at the mouth of a cave leading into the howling pit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Snake. You okay? (unhooks the lariat) I heard gunfire down here... (begins to swing the rope) Never been down this far before... (swings the rope in a huge arc) Grab this. Pendejo Bob tosses the lariat. The noose flies across the pit, and Plissken grabs it with his good hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now hang on. Plissken wraps his good hand and arm in the noose, as Pendejo Bob jerks the line hard. Plissken is in mid-swing, and the rope jerking pulls him abruptly in the opposite direction... Plissken's boot slips out of the wire mesh... And Plissken falls like a brick, stops abruptly as the line catches, and swings against the side of the pit. He dangles with only his one good arm holding on to the rope. Pendejo Bob pulls the line upward, straining against Plissken's weight. Slowly Plissken rises, a tug at a time, hauled up the edge of the pit toward the cave above... ... when suddenly he passes another opening, a storm drain below Pendejo Bob. He swings into the drain, grasps the side with his hand, and pulls himself in... Pendejo Bob stares down at his rope disappearing into the side of the pit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Snake...where are you? Plissken crawls into the slimy drain, pulls the rope off of him. Ahead in the darkness is the rushing of water. He turns on weak legs, back toward the pit behind him. Bleeding. Numb in one hand. His leg on fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (yells) I'm in another opening... Storm drain... There may be another way up to you... Plissken crawls along the drain. The sound of rushing water gets louder. He comes to the edge of the drain. Right below him is another drain filled with water rushing through it like a river. Plissken is stuck. He turns, in great pain, and starts back toward the pit... when suddenly everything starts shaking. Booming. It's a small earthquake, a pre-shock.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Suddenly the concrete bottom on which he stands gives way, cracks, disintegrates... And Plissken falls backward into the rushing water, and is pulled suddenly downstream into the drain, disappearing from sight...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stands silently above, listening...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake... (no reply) Snake! Booming. The whole pit shudders, shaking. Another earthquake. Pendejo Bob drops the rope, turns and dashes away down the vibrating storm drain...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Black oil-slicked water rushes in the moonlight, out of a huge opening in what appears to be a canyon wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As an arm shoots out, clutching the edges of the drain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Emerges from the hole, slides out, tumbles down to a water-filled canyon bottom. He lies there for a moment, trying to focus his eye. Stabbing pain in his shoulder and leg. Finally he rises unsteadily to his feet, looks around, trying to get his bearings. He finds himself at the bottom of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Straight down Wilshire Boulevard is an enormous canyon, a river bottom gouged out of concrete in the big earthquake. At least 30 feet deep, it is a vast trough leading past skyscrapers and buildings above, off into the distance. Plissken warily glances at his watch: 1 hour 10 minutes to go. Suddenly Plissken is struck by a pair of headlights. Pipeline's dune buggy comes bumping along the canyon bottom, sloshing through water, pulling up next to Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake. Saw you at the game tonight. Great shot. (stares at him) You look like shit. Plissken hobbles over to the dune buggy as Pipeline gets out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You feel those pre-shocks, Snake? Pipeline unties the various surfboards he has lashed to the rear of the buggy. He lifts one down and slings it under his arm.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could be a big one comin' any minute now...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's... Cuervo Jones...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long gone. You'll never catch up with him now, Snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anaheim. Headquarters for everything. The whole town's gonna be there. Things changin' fast around here, Snake. It's not the same as the old days, man. A thumping sound skyward. More choppers thunder over them, on their way southeast. Plissken grabs Pipeline with his good hand...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take me there... But he's too weak. His hand slides off. Plissken sinks to his knees. Pipeline stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You ain't doin' so good, Snake. You need help. (bends down, helps Plissken to his feet) You should talk to Hershe. She hates Cuervo. They used to be partners, but they split up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hershe. She lives downtown with Mojo Dellasandro in the big boat. Down that way. Pipeline points down the canyon to the east.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's connected with the Black Cowboys, and they don't take shit from nobody... Suddenly that booming, shuddering rumble begins. The canyon starts to shake. The water in the canyon floor sloshes wildly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yo', man. It's a big one. And the earthquake hits like a roaring sledgehammer. The walls of the canyon crack. Plissken and Pipeline are thrown to the ground. Skyscrapers above them on Wilshire rock and tremble in the quake. Pieces of the building sheer off, fall. A parking garage caves in. Thunder shakes the earth around Plissken and Pipeline. The canyon floor splits open. Water pours into the cracks. Huge boulder-sized chunks of concrete tumble down the canyon walls. And then suddenly it all stops. The booming subsides. The earth stops shaking. Plissken and Pipeline get to their feet, look around. The water around them continues to slosh about violently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tsunami, Snake. His eyes wide, a smile on his face, Pipeline hurries over to the dune buggy, grabs another surfboard from the back, hands it to Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Surf's up big time. Now there is another deep sound rising, coming from the west behind them: A bass roar that slowly climbs from the very bottom of the register upward, as if some massive wall of doom were on its way... Pipeline kneels, positions his surfboard in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get ready, Snake. It's gonna be some kinda ride. Plissken looks behind him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is blasting down the Wilshire Canyon, coming right for them. It is a 25-foot wall of ocean water, moving fast, bellowing like a thunderclap. Plissken sees he can't climb out of the canyon in time, moves over to Pipeline, kneels down...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let the front edge pick you up. Don't get on your board till it peaks. Behind them, the tsunami slams along the canyon, coming right for them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't lose it, man. You slip off your board and it's the Big Wipeout, you know what I mean? The roaring is so loud it's like being on the inside of a cannon barrel. The tsunami is 100 feet away... 75 feet... 50 feet... 25 feet... It rolls up right behind them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hang on, Snake! (yells)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of the tsunami sweeps under them. Pipeline and Plissken push off from the canyon floor just as the water shovels them upward like a cow catcher on a train. The water sweeps them up until they disappear under the blackness... Until suddenly Pipeline pops up on top of the tsunami, riding on his surfboard, arms outstretched, feet braced. And then Plissken pops up beside him, surfing clumsily on top of the tsunami wave, kneeling on his surfboard. They blast down Wilshire Canyon at 80 miles an hour. Plissken is wobbly on the surfboard, but he manages to stay on top of the wave. Finally, he gets the hang of it, glances over at Pipeline, who grins from ear to ear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Awesome, Snake. AWESOME, man! Plissken looks up ahead...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five feet from street level. An old van speeds along what's left of Wilshire Boulevard, right on the canyon's edge. It veers around debris in the street, changes lanes suddenly, hell bent for leather. Plissken and Pipeline move closer and closer to the van as the tsunami sweeps them along. Now they move alongside the van and Plissken stares over...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: R - THE VAN Behind the wheel is Map To The Stars Eddie, driving like a lunatic, his teeth bared and set, madder than shit. Plissken's eye widens, burns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Pipeline) See you later. And suddenly Plissken shifts his weight, and the surfboard tips and slides sideways, across the surface of the tsunami all the way over to the edge, right next to the van. Map To The Stars Eddie glances to his left...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is surfing the tsunami not 10 feet away from him. Map To The Stars Eddie stares in absolute horror. Plissken tips the board again, and slides another 5 feet closer...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jams the pedal, and the van screams forward...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: AS MAP TO THE STARS EDDIE

direction.raw_text: Stands up and leaps from the surfboard... For a moment he is airborne, leaping across the gap to the van... and slams into the side of the van. He grabs on to the roof, hangs on with one hand, his body whipping against the rocking, bucking side. Map To The Stars Eddie starts swerving, trying to throw Plissken off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The van shoots back and forth across Wilshire, Plissken dangling inches from the tsunami-filled canyon. Plissken pulls himself up and crawls onto the roof...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Map To The Stars Eddie pulls his gun, cocks it... When suddenly Plissken's hand snakes down from the roof, reaches in the driver's window, grabs his hair, and slams his forehead into the steering wheel with a THOCK! Map To The Stars Eddie goes out like a light. He slumps over in the seat... but his foot is stuck on the accelerator. Plissken grabs the wheel with his left hand, and manages to steer the van from the roof. The van lurches wildly, hits a chunk of concrete in the street, skids, fishtailing violently from the impact. It smashes against the curb, screeches and bumps along concrete. Map To The Stars Eddie's foot is bumped right off the accelerator, and the van slows to a wobbling, grinding stop. Plissken slowly climbs down from the roof, opens the driver's door, shoves Map To The Stars Eddie out of the way, and jumps in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken pulls out into the street and speeds off down Wilshire. Map To The Stars Eddie starts to come around. Plissken grabs his gun, cocks it, puts the barrel up against Map To The Stars Eddie's temple just as he comes to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Listen up. I need directions. Downtown. Somebody named Hershe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure, Snake. No problem. (groggy) You gonna kill me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Later.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't help it, Snake. I had to shoot you. Cuervo made me do it, I swear to God, man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cease fire with the bullshit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. Keep goin' straight. Two blocks down, turn right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones' image fills the screen. He addresses the camera, holds the prototype in his hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Abandon your firebases by 0500 hours. Have the news media standing by for my coronation. I'm arriving in style.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the TV screen to reveal we are in...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Malloy, the President, Brazen, and the other Controllers and Police Personnel stare silently at their TV screens.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He must be bouncing the signal from one of our communications satellites.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That means CableNet has already picked it up. This thing's going live all over the country.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (on the TV) It's a brand new day comin' up this morning, and I'm just so proud to be leading the parade. See you soon, putos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The image blinks off into static. A grim silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The prototype appears to be armed, Mr. President. (the President nods grimly) Shall I begin evacuation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does he know how to activate it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, yeah. All you have to do is push the button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about Plissken? He could still be -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Forget him. He's dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That may not be true, Mr. President. (beat) He's one tough case. Plissken's been dead so many times I can't count. But he never stays down. A long beat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are two choices, Mr. President. Wait for Plissken, or surrender. It's your decision. The President sighs heavily.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .A. - NIGHT Jammed next to the remains of the Bonaventure Hotel is the Queen Mary, permanently dry-docked between the broken skyscrapers by the Big One. The van stops next to a huge hole in the side of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The glow of Map To The Stars Eddie's flashlight takes him and Plissken deeper and deeper into the hulking remains of the ship.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They walk through a dimly lighted area lined with shops. Their glass display windows are covered with layers of impenetrable dirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They enter a long, narrow corridor. At the end is a doorway. There is light in the room beyond.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken and Map To The Stars Eddie enter a long room lit by gas jets on the walls. In it is a crumbling, Victorian swimming pool. A heavy mist rises from the pool's surface and hangs over everything. At the far end is a group of people. Spinal and the Black Cowboy Gang. Boots, spurs, dusters, and guns. Mojo Dellasandro. Jamaican Voodoo witch doctor. A brutal, scowling face. And a beautiful woman in a bathing suit, her back facing us. Plissken and Map To The Stars Eddie approach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Hershe. How're you doin'? The woman turns and faces them. This is HERSHE, an absolutely drop-dead, gorgeous transvestite who looks completely convincing as a woman but talks in Isaac Hayes' voice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (eyes brightening) Hershe - it's Snake Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, Hershe. I brought him to see you. Plissken walks right up to Hershe, has no reaction at all to the transvestite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need a favor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's in it for me? Plissken stares, a glimmer of recognition on his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute. I know that voice. (beat) You're Carjack Malone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You two know each other? Plissken is seething. Hershe remains calm, glacial.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You owe me. You left me holdin' everything back there in Cleveland.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (astounded) Hershe, you were in Cleveland?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. With me and Texas Mike O'Shay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was called away on urgent business, Snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't lie to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, so I made another deal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got a new deal for you. Plissken raises Map To The Stars Eddie's gun, aims it right between Hershe's eyes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You help me, you live. The others tense, hands on guns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wouldn't be doin' that, Snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have a little arrangement. Anything happens to me, you're dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm already dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (long beat) I see your point. What's the favor?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looks at his watch) Get me to Cuervo Jones. Get me to the Kingdom. I got one hour.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dream on, blue eye.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Say goodnight, Carjack. Plissken cocks his gun, starts to squeeze the trigger...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait a minute. All right. Hold on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones has more firepower than two armies. No one gets near him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he's got the prototype. And the girl. He holds all the cards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exactly what is this prototype? What does it do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You push the button, it sends a signal to a ring of space defense satellites. They're orbiting bombs. Nukes. They explode. Huge space burst. (beat)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Electromagnetic Pulse. It happens instantly when a nuke is airburst. EMP shuts down every power source below the satellites - instantly. All electrical devices, computers, cars, airplanes, cities. It's the dark ages again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So whoever has it runs the show.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were gonna use it on South America, Africa, Asia - any country hostile to the United States.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Only Cuervo's got it now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that ring of satellites will be in position over the U.S. at 5:00 a.m. this morning.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you know all this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I used to represent the guy who invented it. I swear to God, Snake. No bullshit. A long silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So what's the deal, gorgeous?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We get the girl and the prototype. And we get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All of us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Me too?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stares at him hard) We'll see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why should we leave? I love L.A. Where we gonna go? What's the payoff?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to get out but I don't have enough money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The President's promised to give whoever helps me 1 million dollars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah? Greenbacks? I got ten million of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh-uh. Bluebacks. This gets everyone's attention.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aw, come on, Snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bluebacks. I'm not bullshittin'. I swear to God.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, sounds thin to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You want to stay here, while Cuervo Jones rules the world?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grim) No, that sucks. (beat) How are we getting out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You always were a loser, Plissken. Makin' things up as you go along. That's why I cut out on you in Cleveland. You're just a bum like the rest of us. Smoke has begun to drift into the pool area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (a soft voice) Use the air. They look at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're burning. Santa Anas. The night wind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're you talking about, Mojo?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Death from above...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken, Hershe, Map To The Stars Eddie, Spinal and the Black Cowboy Gang stand on the top deck of the Queen Mary. Mojo Dellasandro straps each man into his own hang glider rig. The wind whips around them. The hillsides in the distance are on fire. They look like strange oversized moths lined up on the edge of the deck. The wind picks up Map To The Stars Eddie's rig. He bumps up and down, side to side, buffeted wildly until Mojo Dellasandro brings him back down to the decking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know about this thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't like it, don't come.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where'd you get these rigs, Carjack?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is Hershe Hernandez, do you understand, cowboy? As Mojo Dellasandro passes out various weapons to the men, Map To The Stars Eddie leans over to Plissken, their hang glider rigs thumping clumsily into each other. Eddie holds up that small, metal-plated portable radio he was carrying when we first met him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got an idea, Snake. (shows Plissken the radio) This looks like the prototype, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, kinda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So maybe we can pull off a Texas switch on Cuervo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If he lets you get close enough.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The wind's up. Let's go. The men brace themselves. Map To The Stars Eddie looks like he wants to die. Hershe looks over at Plissken and grins.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you in hell, Snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I'm late, Carjack, don't start without me. With that Plissken launches himself off the deck, sailing out over open space, then down toward the street...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gliding through the air, as the wind picks him upward. He arcs away from the street level, up toward the remains of the downtown skyscrapers. Behind him, one after another, the group takes off into the wind, diving, rising with the wind. Map To The Stars Eddie makes a rapid suicidal dive right down toward the pavement below. He screams like a madman until the wind lifts him at the last possible second.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The group of hang gliders sweep past the buildings. A bracero family is having dinner by candlelight two feet from the edge of a sheer precipice, as the side of the skyscraper they live in has been torn off. They wave to Plissken as he passes. Two floors down, someone has hooked up huge speakers and a croaking male voice is singing a Barbra Streisand hit to a background track. A beautiful girl in a sheer diaphanous gown dances far out on a narrow girder, waving a scarf at the moon. Plissken and the others now fly in formation, like avenging bats through the night, except for Map To The Stars Eddie who keeps rising and plunging violently, barely in control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An army of vehicles and people pour into Disneyland - but it's a Disneyland gone to hell. A huge sign reads: "THE HAPPY KINGDOM" The gates no longer exist. The overhead tram lies broken on the ground. Slowly vehicles drive straight inside... A battered old limousine carries Cuervo Jones and a grim-looking Utopia past the ruins of the train and around the ghost-town square of Main Street. Ahead is the fairy castle, broken and crumbling, like some relic from a nightmare. Around it are the thrill rides, tossed in to a jumbled mass by the force of the original earthquake. Crowds are waiting. Gangs of every conceivable description. Ethic gangs. Female gangs. Gangs of children. Also families with hangers-on. As soon as the limousine appears, the crowds begin cheering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones stares out at the masses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're simple people. They love a party. (turns to Utopia) We're gonna throw them one hell of a party when we get to America. Right? Utopia is silent, sullen. Cuervo raises his hand to her and she jumps, cowering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put a smile on your face. A terrified smile spreads across Utopia's face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the limousine inches down Main Street, suddenly a wall of headlights pop on. 100 or so battered old vintage Chevys rev their engines, begin bouncing up and down wildly on hydraulic lifts. Gangs begin cheering, firing their weapons into the air like New Year's Eve. At the end of Main Street is a huge open area - almost an arena, beyond which are parked a literal army of helicopters. As the limousine stops, and Cuervo Jones emerges, Utopia on his arm, the cheering begins, a wall of sound through the park. Three Black Muslims step out to greet Cuervo, dressed in turban-like headgear and sunglasses, wearing black capes and carrying old Thompson machine guns. They stop, give the right-handed power salute. One of them, BIVOUAC, speaks to Cuervo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones. Welcome, my Brother. Cuervo Jones turns to the crowd, extends his arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you ready for the New World? And the loudest, longest cheer you've ever heard goes up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken and the group sail through the sky like silent avenging angels toward Disneyland below them and several miles away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Glances at his wrist watch. Only 20 minutes left. Map To The Stars Eddie swings wildly over in his direction, manages to stabilize his glider for a few moments.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that what I think it is?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah. The place kept changing owners. Finally went bankrupt. That thing in Paris killed 'em. Hershe and Spinal sweep over next to Plissken and fly in close formation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake. We need some kind of diversion. A beat later all of them look over at Map To The Stars Eddie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo Jones leads Utopia toward a large attack helicopter out in front of all the others. The choppers are all starting up, roaring, blades turning. Suddenly shooting down out of the sky is a screaming, yelling, Map To The Stars Eddie diving out of control, eyes wide as he passes Cuervo Jones and Utopia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo. Hey, man, I made it! I made it! Wait for me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Map To The Stars Eddie crash lands into the ruins of a fast food restaurant - KACRUNCH! A beat or so later he staggers out of the rig, dizzy and confused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey Cuervo... Cuervo Jones turns to Bivouac.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you please kill him for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My pleasure. Bivouac raises his machine gun...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cuervo, wait! I got news. There's about to be an attack. Cuervo holds up his hand, stopping Bivouac. Everyone tenses. Map To The Stars Eddie races over...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're about to get hit, Cuervo. It's Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told me he was dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought he was, but he came back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where? Map To The Stars Eddie moves close to Cuervo, out of breath, looking like he may faint...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh Cuervo...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (long beat) What?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (stalling) It's so good to see you again.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Plissken?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's... near.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're stalling, Eddie. (grabs him) Talk, you little gringo!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (eyes wide) Cuervo, look out behind you! Map To The Stars Eddie suddenly grabs Cuervo as if to protect him, and manages to wrap himself around the prototype in Cuervo's hand. At the same moment Bivouac and the Black Muslim open fire on an old storefront behind Cuervo Jones. The place is shredded. Cuervo Jones pulls Map To The Stars Eddie up off the ground, and grabs what looks like the prototype out of his clutches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've lied to me for the very last time. Cuervo Jones pulls out a pistol, cocks it, aims at Map To The Stars Eddie's face...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! No, not the pistol. A huge explosion rocks Main Street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Suddenly out of the night sky Spinal and the Black Cowboys dive right down across Main Street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Another explosion sends everyone scurrying for cover. Spinal pulls the pin on a grenade, throws it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! BLOOM! Explosions erupt everywhere! Cuervo Jones grabs Utopia, turns to run toward to the lead helicopter when... Plissken roars down out of the sky and his him full force. Cuervo, Plissken and the hang glider go tumbling and crashing in a heap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Chaos and pandemonium. Hershe dives down over the gangs, ripping hellfire from his automatic rifle. People running. Explosions. Map To The Stars Eddie grabs Utopia. Plissken and Cuervo Jones get to their feet and have at it! Through flames and running people Plissken and Cuervo battle. In Cuervo's hand is a long black knife. Just as he's plunging it, Plissken steps aside and grabs him. Locked together, they battle savagely. The knife cuts Plissken's chest. Cuervo moves for Plissken's throat. Plissken smashes him in the face. They both grip the knife in a deadlock. From above, Spinal dives down and hurls a grenade. Cuervo and Plissken disappear in a huge flash of fire and smoke as the grenade erupts out of the pavement nearby. When the smoke clears, three things are on the ground. Plissken. Cuervo Jones. The prototype. Instantly Plissken and Cuervo dive for the prototype. Plissken has it, kicks Cuervo in the face, drags himself to his feet and takes off running (as fast as a man can run with one bullet in his leg) Map To The Stars Eddie drags Utopia toward the lead helicopter, as Hershe comes in for a landing. Spinal comes in for a landing, continues to throw grenades. The other Black Cowboys land, provide covering fire. Plissken races for the chopper. Behind him, Cuervo Jones is on his feet and in pursuit. Hershe opens fire at Cuervo. Cuervo dives behind a smoking, burning Chevy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As everyone scrambles in. A Black Cowboy is hit by gunfire, slides down the bulkhead and out the door. Plissken jumps in the left seat, takes the controls. Utopia and Map To The Stars Eddie both climb in the right seat together. The others are in the back, firing back at the gangs. Plissken pulls in power.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .P.M. GAUGE The needle's at 100% plus. Full power.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lead chopper shudders, trying to get off the ground. Gunfire continues.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship shakes violently.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's overloaded! We're too heavy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (screams from the rear compartment) Somebody get off!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (glares at him) Who? All eyes quickly move to Map To The Stars Eddie...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Bullets rip through the windscreen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is moving, through the smoke, charging the ship!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ship trembles. Plissken moves his feet, jams in the left tail- rotor pedal all the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rotates, turns around 180 degrees on the ground, pushed by the tail rotor force.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Plissken inches it forward...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Begins sliding across the ground, skids grinding along the pavement, sparks flying - slowly at first, now picking up speed... In the cockpit, the ship lurches and jumps and slams! Everyone is bounced around. The helicopter moves fast now - faster -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As they rise up, an inch off the ground - then two inches - then a foot - Cuervo Jones emerges from the smoke, running ahead of the other gangs, barreling toward the ever-so-slowly rising chopper...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As it lifts - five feet - climbing... The helicopter pulls away from the charging gangs and Cuervo's sprinting figure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THROUGH WINDSCREEN See the Matterhorn ahead, coming closer and closer. Hershe leans out the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're not gonna make it over the fuckin' mountain! The helicopter moves right toward the edge of the Matterhorn, 15 feet... 10... Plissken tries to maneuver out of the way... 8 feet... 5... The helicopter wobbles over the top of the mountain, the right skid catching on the Matterhorn's edge! A horrible cracking sound, and the right skid is ripped off from its front mounting, hanging half off the ship! On the ground, Cuervo Jones jumps into one of the waiting helicopters as now the gangs race into ships and begin lifting off into the sky. Finally Cuervo's chopper lifts off...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An alarm horn sounds. Everyone is on the move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A crowd surrounds a computer screen with a small green blip moving over a grid of L.A.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aircraft leaving the island, sir. It's passed into restricted space, heading this way. Malloy, the President, and Brazen exchange glances.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is it Plissken? Nobody knows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commander, I'm getting radio contact with the aircraft.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boost it. The COM Officer flips a switch, and we hear Plissken's voice booming through HQ.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Get ready, shitheads. We're comin' in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank God.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (grabs a radio mike) Plissken - this is Malloy. Do you have the prototype?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (into his radio) Yeah, I got it. Plissken glances at the transistor radio in his hand, shoves it in his boot, reaches his hand out to Map To The Stars Eddie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Map To The Stars Eddie) Now give me the real one. Utopia stares into Plissken's eye. Map To The Stars Eddie shrugs innocently
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I couldn't make the switch, Snake. I don't have it. Suddenly Utopia reaches into Map To The Stars Eddie's coat and pulls out the real prototype. She hands it to Plissken
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now we're even, Snake. Map To The Stars Eddie makes a lunge for it, but Plissken whacks him in the face. His head bobs slowly back and forth for a moment, then he slumps in the seat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Malloy set up in the staging area for landing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commander Malloy - he's got lots of company. Malloy and the others look at the computer screen. Plissken's green blip is followed by hundreds of other green blips all rapidly closing in on him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Battle stations... The room springs into action...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think we've burned off enough fuel. We may be lighter enough to hover. Just barely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can you land?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. The right skid's broken. If I try to set it down she'll crash. I have to stay in a hoverwhile you jump off. (beat as Plissken looks at Utopia) Hey, Carjack. We gotta hide the girl. Give her your dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (ice cold) My name is no longer Carjack. Will you please get that through your fucking head?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Holy shit. They look, as suddenly the night sky on either side of them is filled with gang helicopters!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The lead helicopter is surrounded by enemy choppers. Above, below, on either side. Right next to Plissken, Cuervo's chopper pulls up just ten feet away. Cuervo grins out at Plissken evilly, unhooks himself from his seat... On the other side, another chopper with Bivouac and the Black Muslims pull up. In the rear compartment, a Black Muslim aims what looks like a huge harpoon gun mounted to the floor.
direction.name: direction

location: SKY OVER THE SAN FERNANDO SEA
result.heading: EXT.

direction.raw_text: ! The line shoots out and a gleaming grappling hook slams into the side of Plissken's chopper, the prongs clawing in, holding. In the lead helicopter, the Black Cowboys, Spinal and Hershe aim their weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't shoot! They can drag us down into the sea. Cuervo Jones leaps from the opened door of his chopper, flies through space, lands on Plissken's door with a WHUMP! He smashes through the side window and grabs Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! KABLAM! Gang choppers open fire, riddling the rear compartment with bullets. Spinal and several Black Cowboys are hit! Plissken fights Cuervo through the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to Utopia) Take the controls! Utopia stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do I do? But Cuervo wrenches the door open, grabs Plissken, and pulls him out of the seat. Utopia grabs the controls. The lead helicopter goes wild, lurching and swinging and dropping. Plissken and Cuervo are locked in a death grip, hanging on to the doorway, one foot in, one foot out. Plissken embraces Cuervo and throws them both over the edge... They fall through space, locked together, until...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! They are jolted to a dead stop, swinging in mid-air, Plissken's arm wrapped around the dangling right skid. The lead helicopter bucks and spins and swings, Plissken and Cuervo suspended below, struggling to the death, whipped back and forth by the helicopter's gyrations. In the cockpit, Utopia grabs the controls. The ship is shaking, swinging like a pendulum. Hershe is hit with gunfire, flops in the rear compartment. Map To The Stars Eddie slowly regains consciousness, stares in horror at Utopia.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Plissken? Outside, Cuervo clutches Plissken around the neck, struggling and thrashing. Plissken head butts him, dazing him for a second...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The dangling skid is breaking loose from its mounting on the helicopter above. Plissken and Cuervo Jones stare up, then at each other, then both begin pulling themselves up the skid, climbing hand over hand, in a desperate race... Both men reach the bottom of the helicopter and leap across to the left skid as the dangling right skid breaks off and falls into the San Fernando Sea. Plissken and Cuervo kick at each other. Plissken slides away from him, looks up... sees the grappling hook stuck into the side of the helicopter... Plissken swings up, straddling the skid. He reaches up and begins prying loose the grappling hook. Cuervo's coming right up behind him, reaching for him, a huge knife in his hands. He raises the knife - when Map To The Stars Eddie leans out of the cockpit door, lowers a gun and aims it right at Cuervo.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, Cuervo. Cuervo looks at him, starts to say something, eyes bulging...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you get to America - let's do lunch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! KABLAM! The shots hit, and Cuervo buckles, falls backwards off the skid, plunging downward toward the surface of the San Fernando Sea... KASPLASH! Plissken rips out the grappling hook...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Map To The Stars Eddie is hit with gunfire, dies, falls out of the seat, out of the door, out of the helicopter - plunges to the water below. Plissken jumps back inside the cockpit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snake, look.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: THROUGH WINDSCREEN Police battle helicopters thunder toward them. In unison, the police helicopters launch their missiles from gun platforms. Burning, white-sulfurous napalm shells streak across the darkness and hit enemy choppers. The sky around the lead helicopter is filled with explosions, waves of rolling fire, falling flaming wrecks plunging past, as enemy choppers begin to hit the water. It is a dreamlike, slow-motion ballet. Huge black police gun ships circle lazily around the enemy choppers, their flex-guns and rockets spitting blue-white fire. The pound the living hell out of the enemy choppers. In f.g. Plissken's helicopter sweeps over the wall.
direction.name: direction
