direction.raw_text: Malloy, the President, Brazen and the rest the Firebase watch as Plissken's helicopter approaches, then zooms right over Rotor City and heads for the distant treeline.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the hell is he going?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Plissken's helicopter comes in, lower and lower, into a hover five feet above the ground. Inside, Plissken pulls in all the power he's got.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's taking all the power we've got to hover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: .P.M. GAUGE Shows 100% plus power. The helicopter is in a trembling hover. Inside...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jump out. Head for the treeline and disappear. Utopia stares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go! Utopia jumps out of the helicopter... lands on the ground and takes off running into the darkness. Inside...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All right, baby. Don't be too rough on me. We're gonna land. Plissken slowly drops the collective control. The left skid sets down, and the ship continues to descend, tips, begins to roll. Inside, as the chopper rolls over, Plissken braces himself. As the blades hit the ground, the chopper goes wild. The fuselage jumps and twists in a grinding fury. Smoke and debris fly. The blades snap off...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: PLISSKEN - INSIDE Looking out the front, the blades smash through the windscreen, barely missing the top of Plissken's head. Plissken is splattered with glass, a piece of metal debris protrudes from the fleshy part of his biceps. Blood pours. The rear compartment explodes into flames as the engine grinds into the gas tank. Fire billows into the cockpit, engulfing Plissken... Outside, Plissken pulls himself out of the door. He is on fire. Dives away from the copper and rolls across the ground just as the flaming mid-section of the ship explodes in a roaring fireball. Plissken climbs to his feet, smoking, wounded... ... as Malloy, the President, Brazen, and a squad of police arrive in vehicles. They slowly get out... ... as Plissken limps toward them...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the anti-toxin...?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me the prototype. Plissken reaches into his boot, hands it to the President.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hold it, Plissken. Now give us the real one. Plissken reaches down into his other boot, comes out with Map To The Stars Eddie's transistor radio. The President hurls the real prototype away, walks to Plissken and grabs the phony. Plissken glances at it lying on the ground. Nobody moves. Plissken looks at their faces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me the goddamn shot! Suddenly everyone begins to smirk. A couple cops laugh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was all a fake, Plissken. Plissken stares at him. More laughter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were injected with glucose. There is no Plutoxin 7 virus. You were never going to die - at least not from anything we gave you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: C'mon, Snake - it's L.A. Everything's phony, you know that. Plissken moves toward the President, stops inches away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Relax, war hero. We took you for a ride, and you came through. Not bad for a dirtbag like you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're free, Plissken. But if you even so much as break wind on a country road I'll crush you like a bug. The President glares at Plissken, turns, walks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Commander... (Malloy looks at him) Look what we found. Across the clearing come two policemen dragging Utopia along with them. They bring her up in front of Malloy. Utopia glances at Plissken.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You didn't finish the mission, Plissken. We'll have to do that for you. Plissken, Malloy and Brazen watch as Utopia is taken away. Finally Plissken turns to Malloy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got a smoke?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna have to learn to respect the law, Snake. The United States is a no- smoking nation. No smoking, no drinking, do drugs, no women unless you're married, no guns, no foul language. It's a brand new day for you, Snake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The name's Plissken. Plissken walks away. Follow his feet as they stop next to the prototype lying in the grass...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Utopia is being strapped into an electric chair by her police guards. The guards step back from Utopia. One of them walks over to a huge switch on the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He holds the real prototype, calmly pushes the button.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The ring of space satellites hover silently above the Earth. See the United States, North America below, as a beautiful sunrise is beginning. Suddenly the satellites explode into white...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the sky is lit white. Malloy, Brazen, and the cops look up. All vehicles stop. Lights out. Sounds of motors running down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Darkness. No power. Everyone looks around. Utopia smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The daylight is coming as police helicopters fall from the sky, crashing. Panic. Policemen run everywhere. A duty sergeant races up to Malloy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're being attacked, Commander. The north wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All of L.A. has arrive at the wall in boats. Gangs lean ladders, use ropes and hooks - they scale the wall. Pendejo Bob leads the charge. Pipeline is right behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gunfire. A pitched battle as cops try to repel the horde of L.A. invaders as they pour over the wall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Firebase is overrun by invaders. Hand-to-hand combat. World War III has begun. Panicked cops race for the trees, abandoning their positions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Third World warriors free Utopia from the electric chair. She joins them as they swarm through the halls...
direction.name: direction
